cyclone.name: FIONA
cyclone.current_location: about 805 miles E of the Leeward Islands
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west toward the Leeward Islands, then near the Virgin Islands and Puerto Rico this weekend
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near Puerto Rico or the Virgin Islands

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Leeward Islands through Virgin Islands and Puerto Rico
weather_observation.wind: Tropical-storm-force winds possible (cumulative probability 7%) late weekend
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor coastal inundation possible in exposed areas, significant surge not expected
weather_observation.rainfall: Heavy rainfall bands could cause flash flooding and reduced visibility at the port
weather_observation.other_hazards: Rough seas and hazardous marine conditions impacting vessel movements
